languages.text: "Собирай всех. Пора решать судьбу наследства Беллардо — и наследников".
"Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's estate — and that of the heirs."
languages.original_text: "Собирай всех. Пора решать судьбу наследства Беллардо — и наследников".

traits.locale_text: "Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's inheritance — and that of the heirs."
"Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's inheritance — and that of the heirs."
"Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's estate — and that of the heirs."
"Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's estate — and that of the heirs."
"Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's estate — and that of the heirs."

languages.text: “把所有人叫过来。是时候决定贝拉多的遗产归属，以及所有继承人的命运了。”
languages.original_text: "Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's estate — and that of the heirs."

traits.locale_text: “把所有人叫过来。是时候决定贝拉多的遗产归属，以及所有继承人的命运了。”

languages.text: «Llama a todo el mundo. Es hora de decidir el destino del patrimonio de Bellardo... y el de sus herederos».
languages.original_text: "Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's estate — and that of the heirs."

traits.locale_text: «Llama a todo el mundo. Es hora de decidir el destino del patrimonio de Bellardo... y el de sus herederos».

languages.text: 「皆を召集せよ。ベラルド邸と相続人たちの運命を決める時がきた」
languages.original_text: "Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's estate — and that of the heirs."

traits.locale_text: 「皆を召集せよ。ベラルド邸と相続人たちの運命を決める時がきた」

languages.text: "Ruft alle zusammen. Es ist Zeit, über das Schicksal von Bellardos Erbe zu befinden – und über das der Erben."
languages.original_text: "Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's estate — and that of the heirs."

traits.locale_text: "Ruft alle zusammen. Es ist Zeit, über das Schicksal von Bellardos Erbe zu befinden – und über das der Erben."

languages.text: « Convoquez tout le monde. Il est temps de régler l'histoire des propriétés de Bellardo... et de ses héritiers. »
languages.original_text: "Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's estate — and that of the heirs."

traits.locale_text: « Convoquez tout le monde. Il est temps de régler l'histoire des propriétés de Bellardo... et de ses héritiers. »

languages.text: "Herkesi toplayın. Bellardo'nun mal varlıklarının ve vârislerin kaderini belirleme vakti geldi."
languages.original_text: "Summon everyone. It is time to decide the fate of Bellardo's estate — and that of the heirs."

traits.locale_text: "Herkesi toplayın. Bellardo'nun mal varlıklarının ve vârislerin kaderini belirleme vakti geldi."
